MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 8:28am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:56am on Wednesday, 28 October 2020
